title.rendered: “IDF Jets Target Hezbollah Military Installations in Southern Lebanon: A Nighttime Operation Overview”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

During the night, fighter jets attacked military buildings and terror infrastructures of the Hezbollah terror organization in southern Lebanon.

Air force fighter jets attacked terror targets of the Hezbollah terror organization overnight in the Maroun al-Ras area in southern Lebanon. Among the targets were several terror infrastructures and a military building.

Also, fighter jets attacked a military infrastructure of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Tir Harfa area, and a military building of the organization in the Yaroun area in southern Lebanon.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3QlJpXB
